resources.string: Nudging people towards better decisions in their usage of technology
NudgeApp is running in the background
NudgeApp is running in the background
This app will not work if you do not grant the permissions for displaying pop-up windows, even while running in the background.
Thank you for giving your permission.
Give your permission or this app will not work.
Use custom text for opening app
Use custom text for closing app

This app needs you to manually enable an accessibility service from settings. Doing so, NudgeApp will be able to collect information about how you use Facebook, Instagram and TikTok, and provide nudges that will help you in making more conscious decisions while using technology. \nClick below -> Downloaded apps -> NudgeApp -> Enable
Service is already running. If you see a permanent notification from NudgeApp, everything is working correctly.

This app is going to monitor your usage of Facebook, Instagram and TikTok. It will prompt you some screens before you enter one of the apps above, having two customizable buttons, one for continuing to the selected app and the other for going back to the home screen. Moreover, during your daily smartphone usage some widget will be shown. Both interactions have been studied to increase your knowledge about dark patterns, and hopefully will help you to make more conscious decisions while using technology.

Know that infinite scrolling is one the dark patterns used by Facebook for keeping you online and earning from your attention. You can keep scrolling as much as you want, but the reward you get is variable, since the quality of the new contents cannot be predicted.

Know that infinite scrolling is one the dark patterns used by Instagram for keeping you online and earning from your attention. You can keep scrolling as much as you want, but the reward you get is variable, since the quality of the new contents cannot be predicted.

Know that infinite scrolling is one the dark patterns used by TikTok for keeping you online and earning from your attention. You can keep scrolling as much as you want, but the reward you get is variable, since the quality of the new contents cannot be predicted.

Know that the infinite scrolling dark pattern used in social networks can lead you to a more passive and problematic technology overuse, causing lack of sleep, decreased communication, depression, or even obesity and ADHD.
You have been scrolling fast recently. Slow down and enjoy the contents.
You have been scrolling really fast recently. Slow down and enjoy the contents.
You have been scrolling fast recently. If nothing is of your interest, consider taking a break.
You have been scrolling really fast recently. If nothing is of your interest, consider taking a break.

Know that pull to refresh is one of the attention-capture dark patterns used in Facebook. It allows you to swipe down and load contents which can be new or not, as it happens in slot machines, where you can win or lose.

Know that pull to refresh is one of the attention-capture dark patterns used in Instagram. It allows you to swipe down and load contents which can be new or not, as it happens in slot machines, where you can win or lose.

Know that pull to refresh is one of the attention-capture dark patterns used in TikTok. It allows you to swipe down and load contents which can be new or not, as it happens in slot machines, where you can win or lose.
Know that the pull to refresh dark pattern used in social networks can lead you to use more technology, causing lack of sleep, decreased communication, depression, or even obesity and ADHD.
You have refreshed the contents. If you have already seen everything, just take a break.
Pull to refresh is like a slot machine. This time itâ€™s a win or a loss?
